snippet.title: Rise & Shine Coming January 13th | Adult Swim Games
snippet.description:
Rise & Shine is coming to Xbox One and Steam on January 13th, 2017

Xbox One: https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/store/p/rise-shine/br3152pvjv5j
Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/347290/

Welcome to Gamearth, a once peaceful planet now threatened by the warmongering Space grunts of Nexgen. In the aftermath of their devastating first strike a child named Rise is forced to take on the sacred gun Shine - and with it the fate of his world.
